headerText: Selection control components allow a user to select options. These components **must** be used with the `v-model` prop as they do not maintain their own state.

checkboxesColors.desc: Checkboxes can be colored by using any of the builtin colors and contextual names using the `color` prop.

radiosDefault.desc: Radio-groups are by default mandatory. This can be changed with the `mandatory` prop.

radiosDirection.desc: Radio-groups can be presented either as a row or a column, using their respective props. The default is as a column.

radiosColors.desc: Radios can be colored by using any of the builtin colors and contextual names using the `color` prop.

switchesColors.desc: Switches can be colored by using any of the builtin colors and contextual names using the `color` prop.

labelSlot.desc: Selection controls' labels can be defined in `label` slot - that will allow to use HTML content

props.mandatory: Forces a selection on a `v-radio` child
props.name: Sets the component's name attribute
props.indeterminate: Sets an indeterminate state for the checkbox
props.value: Sets the value of the selection control component
